name: SpeedefyRouter
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Speedefy skill and Alexa, you can now control your Speedefy router with voice commands. For example, you can ask Alexa to turn on/off Guest WiFi and so on. To take full advantage of these features, the following things are required—an alexa-supported Speedefy router, the Speedy WiFi App (available on Google Play and App Store), and an Amazon Alexa enabled product such as Amazon Echo,or Dot, Fire TV with Amazon Alexa and so on.
To get started, enable this skill and link your account which is registered in Speedy WiFi app. To link your Speedy WiFi account with Alexa, enter the email address you use to sign in to your app, followed by the verification code sent to your email. Once your account is linked with Alexa, you could control your WiFi network with supported commands. As time goes, there're more features to be supported with amazon Alexa.
For more information or troubleshooting problems, visit www.speedefy.com
